content.prompt: Which of the following migration patterns had the greatest impact on United States society in the 1950s?

choices.label: Immigration of eastern and southern Europeans to the United States
Migration of Mexican Americans to midwestern cities
Immigration of East Asians to the West Coast
Migration of Americans from urban centers to the suburbs
Migration of American Indians from the Dakotas to California

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
